summary: Six forensic undergrads embark on a scientific expedition to a remote island that was once used as illegal biological testing grounds for life-term prisoners.
cast: Katharine Isabelle|Michael Shanks|Brendan Fehr|Brendan Fletcher|Nick Moran|Jesse Moss|Kristie Patterson|Michael Eisner|Lyndon Bray|Ryland Alexander|Jason Truong|Shannon Jardine
keywords: abandoned prison|two word title|number in title
title: 13 Eerie
